item.question:
unflagging
[ˌʌnˈflæɡɪŋ]
item.answer:
【考法】adj. 不懈的，不知疲倦的：not declining in strength or vigor
【例】I’m greatly indebted to my editor, without whose unflagging efforts this book cannot be published on time. 我非常感谢我的编辑，没有他／她的不懈努力这本书不可能如期上市。
【近】indefatigable, inexhaustible, tireless, weariless, unrelenting
【反】dull, lackadaisical, languid, lethargic, listless, sluggish, torpid 无精打采的
【派】 unflaggingly adv. 不懈地
